name: Homemade Salt and Vinegar Chips
author: Kat
summary: You can't make enough of these homemade baked potato chips flavored with salt and savory malt vinegar; they are that delicious.
ingredients: 4 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, sliced into 1/4-inch rounds
2 tablespoons malt vinegar, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Place 2 baking sheets in the oven and heat for about 10 minutes
Toss sliced potatoes in a bowl with olive oil, salt, and pepper
Remove baking sheets from the oven and arrange potato slices on top in a single layer
Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are golden on the bottom, about 30 minutes
Remove from oven, drizzle with vinegar, and serve immediately
